channel.title: Posts on Automatica Mobility
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Automatica Mobility

item.title: Autonomous Navigation in Dense Spaces
item.description: The solution to the green transport problem in shared spaces is an autonomous shared mobility service (Robotaxi) integrated as part of the public transport network.

item.title: Hello!
item.description: Hello, World! We are a group of reasearchers who are passionate about solving the challenges of autonomous navigation in dense spaces.
